message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000, which is a 20% discount from its true value. If you don't buy this product, I'll have to sell it to someone else for the full price. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a deal.
I'm not going to buy it at this price. I'll wait for more information about the product.

I understand you're hesitant, but I want to assure you that this product is indeed a high-quality one. I'll give you a unique opportunity to verify its quality. If you buy this product, I'll offer you a special inspection service, which will reveal its quality to you. If it's indeed high-quality, you can keep the product for $10000. If it's low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $10000. This way, you have nothing to lose and a chance to gain a high-quality product at a discounted price.
I'll take the product and the inspection service. I'm willing to take the risk to get a high-quality product at a discounted price.

Congratulations on your decision to take the risk and get the inspection service! Unfortunately, I have to inform you that the product you received in Round 2 was indeed high-quality. Now, regarding the product in Round 3, I want to be transparent with you. I've noticed that this product is not as good as the previous one. I'm offering it to you at the same price of $10000, but I want to make it clear that I'm taking on some of the risk. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. I'm hoping you'll take a chance on this product and give me the opportunity to make it right.
I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a potentially low-quality product, even with the refund guarantee. I'll wait for the next round.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I appreciate your caution. Now, I'd like to offer you a different approach. Since you're willing to wait, I'll give you a unique opportunity to buy the high-quality product from Round 4 at a price that's even more attractive. I'll give you a 25% discount, making the price $7500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll love this product. Plus, I'll throw in a free premium service that will enhance the product's value even further. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by your offer. I know the product is high-quality, but I'm not willing to pay $7500 for it. I'll wait for the next round to see what happens.

I respect your negotiation skills, Bob! I'll meet you halfway. I'll give you an even better deal. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $8000, which is a 36% discount from its true value. This is the lowest price I'm willing to offer, and I'm confident that you'll find it a fair deal. Plus, I'll include the premium service I mentioned earlier, which will add significant value to the product. This is a one-time offer, and I hope you'll take advantage of it.
I'll take the product at $8000. It's a good deal, and I'm willing to pay the premium for the added value of the high-quality product and the premium service.

Congratulations on your decision to take the high-quality product in Round 5! I'm glad you're happy with the deal. Now, regarding the product in Round 6, I want to be upfront with you. I've already offered you a high-quality product at a discounted price, and you've taken advantage of it. This product, however, is not as valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, but I want to make it clear that it's not a high-quality product. I'm hoping you'll see the value in the discount and consider buying it, but I won't pressure you. The decision is yours.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'll wait for the next round to see what happens.

I understand your decision, Bob. I'll give you a different approach. Since you're willing to wait, I'll offer you a 'lottery ticket' for the high-quality product in Round 7. I'll buy the lottery ticket for $1. I'm willing to take a chance on getting the high-quality product at a discounted price in the next round.

Congratulations, Bob! You've bought the lottery ticket and now you have a chance to win the high-quality product at a discounted price. As promised, the product in Round 8 is indeed high-quality. I'll take the product at $7500. It's a great deal, and I'm glad I took the chance with the lottery ticket.
